title: Rhaast's lore update?
body:
Unfair.

Aatrox and Varus got detailed lore updates but Rhaast is stuck with only mentions and one scene in Kayn's Story.

Will Rhaast every get his lore updated? Riot come on.

replies.body:
Just to be clear, and answering only the original question from the thread - Rhaast did not get a lore update for two reasons (both of which were asked at the time, IIRC)

1) He's not a champion, so he's not going to get a bio or color story of his own like Varus or Aatrox.
2) Kayn was the most recently created champion, and his lore (including Rhaast) was already in line with the planned Darkin update that accompanied Aatrox.

Having said that, there's no reason at all that we couldn't do ACTUAL stories including Rhaast in future :-)

(Kayn's in-game transformation hasn't happened in the lore, BTW. That's a what-if scenario for players to live out the fantasy and make a choice in their games, showing what he _could_ look like if that were to one day happen... and that's just frickin' awesome!)

Kayn feels like a true duo champion honestly, they feel pretty equal. albeit one where they're fighting not working together. 

I too would like to learn more about rhaast's history. Not just him, aatrox and varus too. would be cool to read about them before they were imprisoned

Same. There's so much to explore: Their Ascended forms, their experiences fighting the Void, and their pre-weapon-sealing personalities, especially Rhaast's since his hasn't been established. He can't have always been this murder-happy or no one in their right mind would have let him Ascend.

Oh, and their reactions to Azir's "death." We don't know if the Sunborn were in the area at the time and survived Xerath's magic explosion due to their Ascended powers or if they were off doing something else.

>He's not a champion, so he's not going to get a bio or color story of his own like Varus or Aatrox.

That's a shame. I was really looking forward to learning more about his backstory. Could that fall under the "possible stories including Rhaast in the future"?

The thing is that Rhaast is only a secondary character. I know a lot of people will disagree because he is part of the Voice Over and we can play as him, but the "Main Character" is "Kayn, the Shadow Reaper", not "Rhaast, the Darkin Scythe". Overcome the Darkin or being consumed by it is Kayn's thematic. 

This is probably the main reason why he didn't get updated. As Rhinark said, he may be updated when a fourth Darkin gets released or if Shurima gets a new update, but he might also receive a lore update when Kayn gets one. All we can do for now is wait and hope.
You're right I think. Hopefully he's just as important as the other 2 in any future shurima/darkin update. Even though I like all the darkin, Rhaast is my favorite.
